about_the_game:
After eons of being imprisoned by the Asgardian gods for his crimes and trickery, Loki has broken free and is taking revenge! Loki has unleashed his army of loyal monsters to terrorize the realms and take control from the Norse gods. Fight back as one of your favorite gods and defeat Loki and his army!

Defeat Loki's Loyal Army


Draugrs, ogres, wolves - they all fight for Loki and must be stopped! Defeat wave after wave of large hordes of monsters and bosses.

Level Up and Gain Powerful Upgrades


When defeated, enemies will drop XP. Collect enough and you'll level up and get to choose from 3 powerful upgrades! Some upgrades boost your stats, some give you new ways of attacking enemies and dealing damage. Collect as many as you can to build the ultimate overpowered god!

Permanently Upgrade Your Character


Gods never die! After dying or completing a run, you'll have the opportunity to spend your hard-earned XP on permanent upgrades. Boost stats for gods or select upgrades unique to each god to make your favorite even stronger!

Explore hand-crafted maps to find hidden upgrades


Each map is hand-designed - no procedural generation here! Hidden within each of them are powerful upgrades. Once you find them, they'll be permanently added to your available pool of upgrades for future runs.

Features

  • 10+ playable Norse gods
  • 15+ roguelike upgrades
  • Permanent upgrades unique to each god
  • Multiple maps to explore with hidden unlockable upgrades

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2ghz, Dual core+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Loki’s Revenge is a bullet heaven roguelite where you play as Norse gods fighting Loki’s army of monsters! Level up to gain powerful upgrades and explore the hand-crafted maps to find secret items. Build the ultimate overpowered god with permanent upgrades and master each god’s signature weapon.
